text: Ne poneset nosyashchaya noshu drugoy: yesli i pozovet otyagchennaya ponesti yeye, ne ponesut u neye nichego, khotya by i byl eto rodstvennik. Ty uveshchayesh' tekh, kotoryye boyatsya Gospoda svoyego vtayne i prostaivayut molitvu. A kto ochishchayetsya, tot ochishchayetsya dlya samogo sebya, i k Allakhu vozvrashcheniye
